snippet.title: Against the Storm - Changing World Trailer
snippet.description:
No game is the same in the ever-evolving world of Against the Storm - a fantasy roguelite city builder.

Get the game on Epic Games Store: 
➤ https://store.epicgames.com/p/against-the-storm
Against the Storm's Steam page: 
➤ https://store.steampowered.com/app/1336490/Against_the_Storm/

You are the Scorched Queen’s Viceroy — a pioneer sent into the wilds to establish and manage new settlements inhabited by humans, beavers, lizards, and harpies. Every city you build will be different; every set of challenges set by the Queen will be unique.

Join the community:
➤ https://linktr.ee/against_the_storm
Check out Steam games from our publisher:
➤ https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/HoodedHorse
